RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGNA CAT stalked the pace looming outside near mid track in upper stretch running past rival in the closing yards. BAYTOWN ANGEL set the pace widening the lead along the inside in upper stretch unable to resist under outside pressure late. POLA OF TROUBLE raced evenly on the outside coming four wide down the lane vying with even action late needing more. LUNA SOL raced evenly moving along the inside down the lane holding position there. MACI'S WORLD played no factor. MOON RIDGE faded on the turn. THIRSTY FOR LOVE was never involved. BIG RED WAVE dropped back on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Pola of Trouble
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide into lane, even bid late needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, widened top lane, couldn't hold inside

ENTRY.NAME: Magna Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed outside top lane, surged clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Big Red Wave
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back on turn

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's World
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Sol
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, inside lane, gained held spot

ENTRY.NAME: Thirsty for Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIFTY PESOS pressed on the turn extending abreast foe through the lane needing all to get a nose down on the wire. IN THE GOSPEL set the pace being collared on the turn responding to cling to the lead along the inside down the stretch missing on the wire in a gutty effort. GLOBAL PRIDE hustled along lost ground to upper stretch vying late six wide. OLD FORTY FIVE slow early gained on the turn bidding willingly from the inside the final eighth. SHADY STAR pressed on the turn then weakened in upper stretch. LAKE HAMILTON played no factor. MCGOLDEN pressed on the inside through the turn then faded to upper stretch. PER DIEM gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: McGolden
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, faded to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Hamilton
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Per Diem
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Global Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, lost ground to lane,l vied late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Old Forty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained on turn, bid inside down the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fifty Pesos
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, extended abreast lane, nose down on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: In the Gospel
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked on turn, dug in under pressure just missed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 27, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNYIELDING set the pace being hooked on the turn digging in to outside pressure holding up gamely. COLONEL MIKE pressed hard on the turn extending outside of foe through the lane being turned away late. THE FILTER gained some on the turn then raced evenly down the lane. CATES SWOOSH pressed hard on the turn weakening in upper stretch. UNION BROTHER propped in the air breaking very late losing all chance easing to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Unyielding
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked on turn, dug in lane, held up gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Colonel Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed hard turn, extended abreast lane, turned away

ENTRY.NAME: Union Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: propped off very late

ENTRY.NAME: Cates Swoosh
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed hard turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: The Filter
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained turn, raced evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AGENDA bid clear on the far turn drawing away in mid stretch being ridden out. TWELVE SHARP set the pace being overtaken on the far turn proving no match down the lane finishing a clear second best. LIPARI hustled along weakened on the far turn going evenly down the lane to best the others. FRANCIA (PER) pressed the early pace fading on the far turn. ICY RAIN was never involved. COUNTESSOFLOVELACE struggled throughout. REINA DEL BALI folded up early.

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Sharp
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ceded far turn, no match lane, clearly second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Agenda
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid clear far turn, widened mid stretch, ridden out,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Chris Harris & Kristine M. Kaufeld DVM

ENTRY.NAME: Countessoflovelace
ENTRY.COMMENT: sturggled throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Francia (PER)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, faded far turn, little left lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lipari
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, weakened far turn, evenly to best others

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Reina Del Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAJUN MANDATE broke sharply setting the pace widening into upper stretch holding safe to the wire. THREE MILE LIMIT chased the pace extending down the lane closing the gap late. AMES MISTER well back early lagged through the turn finding belated stride to close after the fact. CRACK THE MOON saved ground finishing well along the rail. GENIUS chased the early pace wearing down to upper stretch. HEY SACH hustled along would tire in upper stretch. PER RULING FROM THE WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, CAJUN MANDATE WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Crack the Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, finished well along rail

ENTRY.NAME: Three Mile Limit
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended lane, closed gap late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Donald Whalen & Track West Racing Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Genius
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through the turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Cajun Mandate
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, widened lane, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Ames Mister
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early, lagged to lane, hit stride after the fact

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Sach
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, tired,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 27, 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibilit y).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GATES OF HEAVEN rallied on the turn wresting the lead abreast rival in upper stretch drawing out late. SAVVY LAYLA went evenly through the turn coming five wide in upper stretch rallying late to save place. UHAVETOBEKITTENME sent clear set the pace through the turn being hooked on the inside in upper stretch weakening late. HAPPY CHARLIE slow early lost ground to upper stretch finishing evenly six wide. SOUTHERN WILL played no factor. ESTILO VARONIL gave way on the turn. FULCO flashed early speed then stopped on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked inside lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Gates of Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied on turn, led abreast top lane, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Savvy Layla
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 5 wide top lane, up late for place mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Fulco
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Varonil
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races No t Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALTMEISTER veered out leaving the gate making the early lead angling for outside position in upper stretch holding to inside pressure late. GREENRIDGE THUNDER stalked the pace saving ground to upper stretch pressing the winner from the inside late. TIMMY slow early raced evenly to upper stretch holding position there. SCREAMING JEREMY slow early played no factor. HUMPTY GRUMPTY was hustled in pursuit through the turn wearing out in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Timmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, held spot

ENTRY.NAME: Screaming Jeremy
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Altmeister
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out break, made lead, hustled to lane, held off foe late

ENTRY.NAME: Greenridge Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed to lane, bid willingly on the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Humpty Grumpty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, spent lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DON'T LOSE HOPE bid clear on the turn then drifted out in upper stretch regrouping to clear late. W H LITTLE MISS GO slow early gained on the turn bidding from the rail in upper stretch being turned back while saving place. TIME FOR CUPID chased the pace angling seven wide in upper stretch finishing evenly. GOLD PASS pressed the pace tiring in upper stretch. NYSSA passed on the turn faded to upper stretch. AWESOME INCENTIVE was always outrun. NURSE KATIE was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, angled 7 wide lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Lose Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid clear turn, drufted top lane, drew off late

ENTRY.NAME: Nyssa
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed on turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: W H Little Miss Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, bid boldly on rail, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired lane
